targets.query: SELECT max("value") - min("value") FROM "kWh" WHERE ("entity_id"::tag = 'hm800_yieldtotal') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  / 1000 FROM "Wh" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'hm800_yieldday') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("elevation") FROM "units" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'sun') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "kWh" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'hm800_ch2_yieldtotal') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value")-min("value") FROM "kWh" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'hichi_gth_sml_total_in') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT max("value") * 1000 - min("value") * 1000 FROM "kWh" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'hichi_gth_sml_total_out') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "kWh" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'hm800_ch2_yieldtotal') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("elevation") FROM "units" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'sun') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
